# Simple approach

The simplest approach is to simply integrate the existing `NAVAR` code by @bussmann2020neural through `reticulate`.

```{r}
source_python("NAVAR/dataloader.py")
source_python("NAVAR/NAVAR.py")
source_python("NAVAR/train_NAVAR.py")
```
